name: biomni-gene-set-enrichment
title: Biomni: Gene Set Enrichment Analysis
description: Perform enrichment analysis for gene lists against multiple biological databases
content:
Overview

Performs gene set enrichment analysis to identify pathways, biological processes, diseases, cell types, and other annotations enriched in your gene list.

Databases

  • pathway: KEGG pathways
  • transcription: Transcription factors (ChEA)
  • ontology: GO Biological Process
  • diseases_drugs: GWAS Catalog
  • celltypes: PanglaoDB cell type markers
  • kinase_interactions: Kinase-substrate interactions

Input Format

JSON array of gene symbols, e.g., ["TP53", "BRCA1", "EGFR"]

Output

Ranked list of enriched terms with p-values and overlapping genes
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/genomics/gene_set_enrichment_analysis.py "${genesFile}" --database "${database}" --top-k ${topK} -o "${outputDir}" ${additionalParams}

spec.name: genesFile
spec.label: Genes JSON File
spec.description: Upload JSON file with array of gene symbols

spec.name: database
spec.label: Database
spec.description: Database to use: pathway, transcription, ontology, diseases_drugs, celltypes, kinase_interactions

spec.name: topK
spec.label: Top K Results
spec.description: Number of top enrichment results to return
